verses.verse: The Lord<WH3068> reigns,<WH4427> let the peoples<WH5971> tremble;<WH7264> He is enthroned<WH3427> [above] the cherubim,<WH3742> let the earth<WH776> shake!<WH5120>
The Lord<WH3068> is great<WH1419> in Zion,<WH6726> And He is exalted<WH7311> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the peoples.<WH5971>
Let them praise<WH3034> Thy great<WH1419> and awesome<WH3372> name;<WH8034> Holy<WH6918> is He.

And the strength<WH5797> of the King<WH4428> loves<WH157> justice;<WH4941> Thou hast established<WH3559> equity;<WH4339> Thou hast executed<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in Jacob.<WH3290>
Exalt<WH7311> the Lord<WH3068> our God,<WH430> And worship<WH7812> at His footstool<WH1916>;<WH7272> Holy<WH6918> is He.

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> were among His priests,<WH3548> And Samuel<WH8050> was among those who called<WH7121> on His name;<WH8034> They called<WH7121> upon the Lord,<WH3068> and He answered<WH6030> them.
He spoke<WH1696> to them in the pillar<WH5982> of cloud;<WH6051> They kept<WH8104> His testimonies,<WH9381> And the statute<WH2706> that He gave<WH5414> them.
O Lord<WH3068> our God,<WH430> Thou didst answer<WH6030> them; Thou wast<WH1961> a forgiving<WH5375> God<WH410> to them, And [yet] an avenger<WH5358> of their [evil] deeds.<WH5949>
Exalt<WH7311> the Lord<WH3068> our God,<WH430> And worship<WH7812> at His holy<WH6944> hill;<WH2022> For holy<WH6918> is the Lord<WH3068> our God.<WH430>
